title: UAW, Mack Trucks agree tentative deal, suspend two-week strike
text:
UAW, Mack Trucks agree tentative deal, suspend two-week strike

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 10:12PM ET)

© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: The Volvo logo on the front grill of a truck in a showroom at the company's Gothenburg headquarters (Reuters) - United Auto Workers (UAW) suspended a two-week-long strike after reaching a tentative deal with Volvo's (ST: ) Mack Trucks on Thursday, both parties said. More than 3,600 union members working at Mack across the United States began the strike this month, in a bid to negotiate new terms. "UAW members at Mack have achieved significant gains toward fair pay, benefits and job security protections," the union said in a statement, without disclosing details. Mack will bring the employees back to work as soon as possible, and expects to ramp up to full production in several days, the firm said in a separate statement.
